programme.title: Kuntilanak Ciliwung
programme.desc: Pada suatu hari, Flora yang tertekan kerana ibunya terlalu melindungi, diajak teman lelakinya, Danu, untuk tinggal di rumah kosongnya bersama rakannya Bella dan Marcell. Tetapi pada suatu hari Flora diserang sawan dan mati serta merta selepas api unggun di tepian sungai Ciliwung. Danu dan rakan-rakannya kemudian menanam mayat Flora secara luar biasa. Roh Flora merayau

programme.title: Santau Merasuk Ep2
programme.desc: Episod 2 mengisahkan Hawa (ibu Halim) yang datang dari kampung, menasihati Hawa dan Nina supaya menerima takdir. Halim merasakan dia boleh mengendalikan pemasalahannya sama Nina itu dengan caranya. Hawa yang menyedari anaknya itu diganggu sesuatu menasihatkani Hawa supaya berubat tetapi tidak diendahkan. Halim merasa bosan dengan ibunya dan menghantar pulang ke kampung

programme.title: Adiwiraku
programme.desc: Adiwiraku berdasarkan kisah benar guru Cheryl Ann Fernando dan perjuangan serta kejayaannya mengajar di sebuah sekolah luar bandar di Kedah. Penggambaran sepenuhnya di Sungai Petani, Adiwiraku menghidupkan kisah SMK Pinang Tunggal dan bagaimana pelajarnya berusaha ke arah pertandingan choral speaking.

programme.title: 4bia
programme.desc: Empat kisah seram berkisar tentang mangsa kemalangan, remaja yang dibuli, cerita hantu dan puteri yang telah meninggal dunia

programme.title: Muzium Misteri Ep13
programme.desc: Memaparkan Ana bekas kekasih Shah meminta bantuan menangkap lembaga yang sering mengganggui ibunya. Lantaran itu dengan kerjasama Daniel dan Adam, lembaga itu dapat diperangkap. Dalam pada itu lembaga baju pula muncul, setakat ini telah mengganggui seorang pemuda. Akhir-akhir ini seorang bernama Kiah, janda sejak dua tahun lalu berminat dan melawat muzium encik Bad. Bad ambil kesempatan berbaik dengannya. Sementara itu Nur memberi amaran melalui whatsapp agar Shah jangan cuba mengatal dengan yang lain. Dalam diam-diam Shah keluar makan dengan Ana kerana membantu ibunya. Kemudiannya dengan pujukan Ana, Shah bersetuju menonton wayang. Sementara itu Adam cuba memujuk Nur, tetapi setakat ini Nur negatif, lagi pun dia sebuk menyemak pelajarannya. Shah juga dihubungi oleh puan Sabariah meminta dia menangkap lembaga baju, tetapi setakat ini masih gagal. Sementara itu Bad dipelawa oleh pemilik muzium bersebelahannya agar bergabung dengannya. Adam dengan Shah juga bertengkar sebab Shah diketahui dia keluar dengan Ana, sedangkan dia ada kekasih. Apa pun mereka bertiga masih bersama dalam mengesan lembaga baju di perkarangan rumah Sabariah. Mereka dapat mengesan tetapi lembaga baju itu menyerang merekabertiga dan menghilang diri.

programme.title: Dendam Orang Mati
programme.desc: Lena (Lisa Surihani) tersedar dari koma selama dua tahun dan hilang ingatan akibat kemalangan. Keadaan bertambah mengelirukan apabila diperkenalkan kepada isteri baru Shahrul (Fizz Fairuz), Min (Miera Leyana) di flat lamanya di tingkat 4 yang kini menjadi tingkat 3A. Lena mula mengesyaki sesuatu yang buruk telah berlaku flat tersebut dan mula berdepan dengan kejadian-kejadian aneh yang menyeramkan. Gangguan seram ini memberikan lebih tekanan terhadap Lena yang terasa diabaikan oleh suaminya, Shahrul yang berbelah bahagi antara isteri mudanya dan Lena.

programme.title: Muzium Misteri Ep19
programme.desc: Memaparkan misi Bad yang terkini mengharap pemburu lembaga menangkap lembaga telefon. Sebelum itu Shah menarik diri dalam tugas pemburu lembaga. Semuanya bermula Adam dan Shah bertengkar dan bergaduh berpunca kedua-duanya sukakan Nur. Kini Shah tahu yang menyebabkan Ana melarikan diri darinya akibat Adam yang memberitahu. Gara-gara Shah juga menyukai Nur dan kerap bertemunya. Adam sebaliknya berdendam kepadanya kerana dia juga menyimpan perasaan terhadap Nur. Usaha mengesan lembaga telefon juga gagal sebaliknya lembaga telefon berani mengganggui ibu Adam sendiri. Lembaga telefon juga mengganggui pekerja Bad di Muzium malahan Bad sendiri juga diganggui. Begitu juga prof. Dem telah juga diganggui dimakmalnya. Adam dan Daniel sebenarnya sukar mengesan lembaga telefon kerana dia berjaya merosakkan alat frekuensi mereka. Kebetulan Daniel dan Adam berjumpa dengan rakan mereka Yusof yang dapat merasai situasi dan mengesan lembaga melalui deria rasa. Mengikut firasat Yusof lembaga telefon ini tidak menyukai orang-orang yang menangkap lembaga. Nur pula kini masih berbaik engan ustaz Ali. Nur juga terus menjadi tali perantaraan untuk bapanya berbaik-baik semula, malah mengesyorkan bapanya berkahwin semula dengan ibunya. Shah pula terus memujuk Ana

programme.title: Budak Magik Ep13
programme.desc: Episod 13 memaparkan kisah Sohot telah diberi amaran oleh Hariman agar beliau berdiam diri sahaja semasa mencari buloh nanti. Sohot telah berjaya mengambil batu ajaib dari Zara tetapi secara tibatiba batu ajaib telah diambil oleh jin bernama Rakib, tanpa pengetahuannya dan ditukarkan menjadi gula-gula. Sohot membuat layang-layang untuk Zara sementara Salim membuat layang-layang untuk Haikal untuk mengambil hati kedua-dua budak tersebut. Johan terlihat Suraya bersama-sama Cikgu Razif dan anaknya makan di sebuah restoran lalu membuat hatinya resah gelisah serta cemburu. Sementara itu Hariman sibuk hendak mencari batu permata sehingga sanggup hendak berjumpa dengan bomoh. Jin Rakib telah menyamar menjadi seorang bomoh lalu menipu Hariman dan juga Salim apabila mereka mendapat satu bungkusan yang diperkatakan oleh bomoh tersebut bahawa didalamnya ada batu permata tetapi setelah dibuka didapati hanya gula-gula dalam bungkusan tersebut. Bomoh tersebut ghaib begitu sahaja dan menjadikan Hariman bertambah geram dan marah.

programme.title: Guimoon: The Lightless Door
programme.desc: Di pusat komuniti di mana pembunuhan beramai-ramai berlaku beberapa tahun sebelumnya dan ia melibatkan penyiasat paranormal yang menemui pintu ke dunia lain.

programme.title: Cikgu Sayang
programme.desc: Seorang guru muda bernama Idayu telah dihantar ke sebuah kampung di Pulau Dinawan untuk mengajar sekolah orang dewasa. Di sana, Idayu telah digelarkan sebagai Cikgu Sayang oleh pelajarnya. Kehadiran Idayu di pulau itu telah menimbulkan perasaan cemburu kepada isteri para pelajarnya. Dalam masa yang sama, Idayu mula tertarik dengan seorang pemuda bernama Anuar yang tinggal di pulau itu.

programme.title: Kelisa
programme.desc: Bapa Sarah dibunuh oleh Zaid membuatkannya harus mengambil alih perniagaaan keluarganya. Tidak mengetahui tentang perkara itu, Sarah mendapat satu tender daripada Zaid namun tidak dipersetujui ibunya kerana tahu akan kelicikannya. Malang menimpanya apabila ibu Sarah meninggal dunia. Sarah ingin membuka semula kes bapanya dan membawa Zaid ke muka pengadilan dengan mendapatkan bantuan seorang bekas banduan.

programme.title: Serampang Tiga
programme.desc: Pak Guntor menghantar anaknya, Indra untuk pergi mendamaikan sebuah kampung dan bertemu adiknya, Naneng. Indra ditemani rakannya, Jalur dalam perjalanan itu. Setibanya mereka di kampung itu, mereka membantu Kiambang dan ayahnya yang diganggu sekumpulan orang jahat. Indra menemui adiknya namun dia telah mati dibunuh. Indra berjanji untuk menuntut bela kematian adiknya.

programme.title: Azizah The Legend
programme.desc: Hubungan percintaan yang tidak direstui oleh orang tua antara Azizah dan Ramli. Diapi-apikan pula hubungan mereka oleh Aziz. Melihatnya sebagai satu cabaran, Ramli pergi ke Singapura untuk mencari rezeki demi menghalalkan Azizah dan mendapatkan restu bapanya - kerja kerasnya berhasil namun lamarannya masih ditolak.

programme.title: Operasi Cegah Jenayah
programme.desc: Dua orang anggota polis, Shah dan Din telah ditugaskan untuk mengawasi satu pertunjukan permata berlian yang bernilai jutaan ringgit. Pihak penganjur juga meminta mereka berdua menjaga para peragawati mereka yang sedang bercuti daripada pertunjukan itu. Dalam masa yang sama, Crystal yang menjadi pengurus agensi peragawati itu merancang satu rompakan barangan berharga yang berada dalam pengawasan Shah dan Din.

programme.title: Anak Sulung Tujuh Keturunan
programme.desc: Megat Paji Alam memiliki sebilah keris ajaib yang diturunkan sejak turun temurun lagi. Anaknya, Iskandar Alam ditangkap musuh tetapi berjaya diselamatkan oleh pasangan yang menamakannya Hamzah. Dipecat oleh Megat Paji Alam, Megat Daka pergi mencari Hamzah. Tidak diketahui oleh Hamzah bahawa Megat Panji Alam ialah bapa kandungnya.

programme.title: Sayang Salmah
programme.desc: Semangat cinta akan bangsa dan negara diterapkan dalam diri Hassan dan Salleh selaku anak kepada Encik Jabar dan Dasimah yang inginkan anak mereka mempunyai rasa patriotik akan negara. Hassan, aktif dalam bidang politik manakala Salleh menjadi seorang pemuda liar yang suka berhibur. Segalanya berubah apabila ayah mereka meninggal dunia.

programme.title: Qaisy & Laila
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai cinta dan pengorbanan gadis Malaysia, Laila yang menyertai Malaysian Relief Team dan jatuh cinta dengan pemuda Afghanistan, Qaisy yang sebelumnya terpaksa menamatkan pengajiannya di Malaysia untuk menjaga adik perempuannya apabila ahli keluarganya yang lain terbunuh semasa Amerika Syarikat melancarkan peperangan ke atas Afghanistan

programme.title: Cikgu Sayang
programme.desc: Seorang guru muda bernama Idayu telah dihantar ke sebuah kampung di Pulau Dinawan untuk mengajar sekolah orang dewasa. Di sana, Idayu telah digelarkan sebagai Cikgu Sayang oleh pelajarnya. Kehadiran Idayu di pulau itu telah menimbulkan perasaan cemburu kepada isteri para pelajarnya. Dalam masa yang sama, Idayu mula tertarik dengan seorang pemuda bernama Anuar yang tinggal di pulau itu.

Anaknya, Iskandar Alam ditangkap musuh tetapi berjaya diselamatkan oleh pasangan yang menamakannya Hamzah. Dipecat oleh Megat Paji Alam, Megat Daka pergi mencari Hamzah. programme.title: Sayang Salmah
programme.desc: Semangat cinta akan bangsa dan negara diterapkan dalam diri Hassan dan Salleh selaku anak kepada Encik Jabar dan Dasimah yang inginkan anak mereka mempunyai rasa patriotik akan negara. Hassan, aktif dalam bidang politik manakala Salleh menjadi seorang pemuda liar yang suka berhibur. Segalanya berubah apabila ayah mereka meninggal dunia.

programme.title: Pendekar Helang
programme.desc: Diutuskan oleh Baginda Sultan untuk mengamankan sebuah desa yang sedang bergolak angkara pendekar yang jahat, Pendekar Helang sengaja mencetuskan huru-hara supaya tidak disyaki oleh Pendekar Daing yang kejam. Pendekar Daing sering mencuri harta orang kampung dan juga menculik anak dara sebagai tahanannya lalu mencetuskan kacau bilau kepada orang di desa itu. Sengaja melakukan perjanjian bersamanya, Pendekar Helang mengambil Sundang Panca Sakti yang dikatakan mampu membunuh pendekar jahat itu dari simpanan Penghulu Malim untuk diberi kepada Pendekar Daing sebagai muslihat untuk membunuhnya. Berlakulah pertarungan antara mereka yang menjadi kunci kepada keamanan di desa itu.

programme.title: Si Luncai
programme.desc: Cinta ditolak kerana pangkat dan darjat, Si Luncai, sang pengembala kambing pergi dengan harapan yang hancur. Dirinya yang lurus dipermainkan oleh Ketua Kampung - namun kejadian tersebut telah membawanya ke seorang nenek kebayan yang telah mengubah hidupnya. Si Luncai menyamar menjadi tukang tabib dan mempermainkan semula Ketua Kampung itu. Berjayakah rancangan Si Luncai untuk mendapatkan cintanya?

programme.title: Kelisa
programme.desc: Bapa Sarah dibunuh oleh Zaid membuatkannya harus mengambil alih perniagaaan keluarganya. Tidak mengetahui tentang perkara itu, Sarah mendapat satu tender daripada Zaid namun tidak dipersetujui ibunya kerana tahu akan kelicikannya. Malang menimpanya apabila ibu Sarah meninggal dunia. Sarah ingin membuka semula kes bapanya dan membawa Zaid ke muka pengadilan dengan mendapatkan bantuan seorang bekas banduan.

programme.title: Rimba Malam
programme.desc: Sofea, seorang gadis jutawan diburu oleh orang-orang Farouk untuk membunuhnya. Satu kemalangan yang disengajakan telah membuatkan Sofea terdampar di tengah-tengah hutan belantara di Kalimantan. Farouk dan orang-orangnya masih memburu Sofea apabila mengetahui dia masih hidup dan tinggal di sebuah perkampungan orang hulu di sana. Sofea sempat menyelamatkan diri atas pertolongan Rafi, pemuda kampung itu ketika Farouk datang mencarinya.

programme.title: Da Di Du
programme.desc: Badu, Badi dan Bada, bertemu dan menjadi sahabat ketika mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan seorang guru persilatan bernama Pak Tua kerana ingin memperbetulkan kisah silam yang tidak menyebelahi nasib mereka. Sepanjang itu terdapat pelbagai peristiwa yang berlaku dari mula mereka belajar sehingga tamat dan pulang ke kampung masing-masing untuk memperbetulkan masa lalu mereka.

programme.title: Serampang Tiga
programme.desc: Pak Guntor menghantar anaknya, Indra untuk pergi mendamaikan sebuah kampung dan bertemu adiknya, Naneng. Indra ditemani rakannya, Jalur dalam perjalanan itu. Setibanya mereka di kampung itu, mereka membantu Kiambang dan ayahnya yang diganggu sekumpulan orang jahat. Indra menemui adiknya namun dia telah mati dibunuh. Indra berjanji untuk menuntut bela kematian adiknya.

programme.title: Kelisa
programme.desc: Bapa Sarah dibunuh oleh Zaid membuatkannya harus mengambil alih perniagaaan keluarganya. Tidak mengetahui tentang perkara itu, Sarah mendapat satu tender daripada Zaid namun tidak dipersetujui ibunya kerana tahu akan kelicikannya. Malang menimpanya apabila ibu Sarah meninggal dunia. Sarah ingin membuka semula kes bapanya dan membawa Zaid ke muka pengadilan dengan mendapatkan bantuan seorang bekas banduan.

programme.title: Sayang Salmah
programme.desc: Semangat cinta akan bangsa dan negara diterapkan dalam diri Hassan dan Salleh selaku anak kepada Encik Jabar dan Dasimah yang inginkan anak mereka mempunyai rasa patriotik akan negara. Hassan, aktif dalam bidang politik manakala Salleh menjadi seorang pemuda liar yang suka berhibur. Segalanya berubah apabila ayah mereka meninggal dunia.

programme.title: Da Di Du
programme.desc: Badu, Badi dan Bada, bertemu dan menjadi sahabat ketika mempelajari ilmu persilatan dengan seorang guru persilatan bernama Pak Tua kerana ingin memperbetulkan kisah silam yang tidak menyebelahi nasib mereka. Sepanjang itu terdapat pelbagai peristiwa yang berlaku dari mula mereka belajar sehingga tamat dan pulang ke kampung masing-masing untuk memperbetulkan masa lalu mereka.

programme.title: Cikgu Sayang
programme.desc: Seorang guru muda bernama Idayu telah dihantar ke sebuah kampung di Pulau Dinawan untuk mengajar sekolah orang dewasa. Di sana, Idayu telah digelarkan sebagai Cikgu Sayang oleh pelajarnya. Kehadiran Idayu di pulau itu telah menimbulkan perasaan cemburu kepada isteri para pelajarnya. Dalam masa yang sama, Idayu mula tertarik dengan seorang pemuda bernama Anuar yang tinggal di pulau itu.

programme.title: Pendekar Helang
programme.desc: Diutuskan oleh Baginda Sultan untuk mengamankan sebuah desa yang sedang bergolak angkara pendekar yang jahat, Pendekar Helang sengaja mencetuskan huru-hara supaya tidak disyaki oleh Pendekar Daing yang kejam. Pendekar Daing sering mencuri harta orang kampung dan juga menculik anak dara sebagai tahanannya lalu mencetuskan kacau bilau kepada orang di desa itu. Sengaja melakukan perjanjian bersamanya, Pendekar Helang mengambil Sundang Panca Sakti yang dikatakan mampu membunuh pendekar jahat itu dari simpanan Penghulu Malim untuk diberi kepada Pendekar Daing sebagai muslihat untuk membunuhnya. Berlakulah pertarungan antara mereka yang menjadi kunci kepada keamanan di desa itu.

programme.title: Serampang Tiga
programme.desc: Pak Guntor menghantar anaknya, Indra untuk pergi mendamaikan sebuah kampung dan bertemu adiknya, Naneng. Indra ditemani rakannya, Jalur dalam perjalanan itu. Setibanya mereka di kampung itu, mereka membantu Kiambang dan ayahnya yang diganggu sekumpulan orang jahat. Indra menemui adiknya namun dia telah mati dibunuh. Indra berjanji untuk menuntut bela kematian adiknya.

programme.title: Azizah The Legend
programme.desc: Hubungan percintaan yang tidak direstui oleh orang tua antara Azizah dan Ramli. Diapi-apikan pula hubungan mereka oleh Aziz. Melihatnya sebagai satu cabaran, Ramli pergi ke Singapura untuk mencari rezeki demi menghalalkan Azizah dan mendapatkan restu bapanya - kerja kerasnya berhasil namun lamarannya masih ditolak.

programme.title: Operasi Cegah Jenayah
programme.desc: Dua orang anggota polis, Shah dan Din telah ditugaskan untuk mengawasi satu pertunjukan permata berlian yang bernilai jutaan ringgit. Pihak penganjur juga meminta mereka berdua menjaga para peragawati mereka yang sedang bercuti daripada pertunjukan itu. Dalam masa yang sama, Crystal yang menjadi pengurus agensi peragawati itu merancang satu rompakan barangan berharga yang berada dalam pengawasan Shah dan Din.

programme.title: Anak Sulung Tujuh Keturunan
programme.desc: Megat Paji Alam memiliki sebilah keris ajaib yang diturunkan sejak turun temurun lagi. Anaknya, Iskandar Alam ditangkap musuh tetapi berjaya diselamatkan oleh pasangan yang menamakannya Hamzah. Dipecat oleh Megat Paji Alam, Megat Daka pergi mencari Hamzah. Tidak diketahui oleh Hamzah bahawa Megat Panji Alam ialah bapa kandungnya.

programme.title: Si Luncai
programme.desc: Cinta ditolak kerana pangkat dan darjat, Si Luncai, sang pengembala kambing pergi dengan harapan yang hancur. Dirinya yang lurus dipermainkan oleh Ketua Kampung - namun kejadian tersebut telah membawanya ke seorang nenek kebayan yang telah mengubah hidupnya. Si Luncai menyamar menjadi tukang tabib dan mempermainkan semula Ketua Kampung itu. Berjayakah rancangan Si Luncai untuk mendapatkan cintanya?

programme.title: Qaisy & Laila
programme.desc: Kisah mengenai cinta dan pengorbanan gadis Malaysia, Laila yang menyertai Malaysian Relief Team dan jatuh cinta dengan pemuda Afghanistan, Qaisy yang sebelumnya terpaksa menamatkan pengajiannya di Malaysia untuk menjaga adik perempuannya apabila ahli keluarganya yang lain terbunuh semasa Amerika Syarikat melancarkan peperangan ke atas Afghanistan

programme.title: Terjebak Nostalgia
programme.desc: Raisa mengejar impiannya bersama kekasihnya di Sora ke New York. Kehadiran Reza yang menemaninya semasa berada di New York membawanya ke dalam situasi yang rumit.

programme.title: Ehsan Love Story
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki tampan bernama Sian yang berasal dari Utara Thailand. Sian dibesarkan oleh ibunya selepas kematian bapanya. Sian yang baru habis belajar menunggu kepulangan teman wanitanya bernama Som yang belajar di Bangkok.

programme.title: Burung Besi
programme.desc: penyeludupan kapal terbang kawalan jarak jauh. Azri yang gemar bermain alat kawalan tersebut menggunakan kepintarannya dengan mengubah suai mesin terbang itu. Apabila dia melekatkan kamera pegun di kapal terbangnya yang akan mengambil gambar setiap 10 saat, banyak gambar keadaan sekeliling yang tidak dapat dilihat dan tersembunyi ditemui. Ini termasuklah gambar yang amat mencurigakan. Azri dan rakannya Leman yang musykil dengan gambar itu mula menyiasat dan turut dibantu oleh Irin.

programme.title: Bini Muda
programme.desc: Jue tinggal di rumah bersama suaminya, Man Loya dan dua orang anaknya. Jue sentiasa memperjuangkan hak kaum wanita. Suatu hari, ketika Man Loya ke tandas, telefonnya berdering dan Jue menjawab telefonnya. Panggilan itu adalah daripada seorang wanita yang menggelarkan dirinya sebagai Bini Muda. Semenjak itu, Jue mula cemburu buta dan bersikap dingin dengan Man Loya

programme.title: Hassan
programme.desc: Hassan ialah seorang anak yatim yang tinggal bersama abang tirinya, Fuad. Tiada sesiapa yang menyukai Hassan termasuk Fuad, Jah dan kanak-kanak lain. Mereka sering memberikan layanan buruk kepada Hassan hanya kerana rupanya yang selekeh. Namun, Hassan tidak pernah ambil kisah.

programme.title: Teacher Chan Ram
programme.desc: Chan Ram dibesarkan di sebuah kampung di mana ibu bapa sudah biasa menghantar anak perempuan mereka bekerja di Bangkok. programme.title: Agak Lain Mas Susu Murni
programme.desc: Mail pergi ke Jakarta untuk mencari kakaknya yang hilang, tetapi dengan tidak disangka, dia bertemu dengan Imah, jodohnya, di tempat kerjanya.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep159
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep2
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep43
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep123
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep160
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Kesabaran Bocah Yang Merawat Ibunya Sendirian Berbuah Kebahagiaan
programme.desc: Pada usia yang masih kecil, Alif terpaksa menjadi dewasa disebabkan masalah yang berlaku dengan kedua ibu bapanya. Dengan kesabaran dan keikhlasan yang besar, Alif menjaga ibunya seorang diri.

programme.title: Suster El Ep49
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Kesabaran Bocah Yang Merawat Ibunya Sendirian Berbuah Kebahagiaan
programme.desc: Pada usia yang masih kecil, Alif terpaksa menjadi dewasa disebabkan masalah yang berlaku dengan kedua ibu bapanya. Dengan kesabaran dan keikhlasan yang besar, Alif menjaga ibunya seorang diri.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep43
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep123
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Suster El Ep49
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Kurang Perhatian, Hanya Alasan Suamiku Puber Kedua

programme.title: Pelangi Untuk Nirmala Ep1
programme.desc: Persahabatan antara dua orang gadis, Pelangi dan Nirmala. Namun, persahabatan mereka ditentang oleh orang tua mereka kerana perbezaan strata sosial. Pelangi hidup dengan sederhana, sementara Nirmala hidup mewah.

programme.title: Bisik Sore Ep7
programme.desc: Pembawa acara menyajikan berita-berita dan perkembangan terbaru dari sejumlah kasus yang menimpa sejumlah tokoh terkenal di Indonesia.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep52
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. programme.title: Detik-Detik Terakhir
programme.desc: Rangga disahkan menghidap kanser oleh doktor dan tidak mempunyai umur yang panjang. Hancur hati ibu dan Rian sebagai adik mendengarnya. Rangga yang berputus asa untuk hidup, bangkit kembali apabila bertemu dengan seorang gadis baik bernama Luna yang juga merupakan teman wanita Rian yang tidak pernah diperkenalkan kepada keluarganya walaupun sudah lama bercinta.

programme.title: Pacarable Sekali Kamu Kang Jahit
programme.desc: Walaupun bercelaru dan menjengkelkan, namun ada sisi baik Sultan yang membuatkan Luna berdecit. Biarpun setiap hari terpaksa berjumpa Ibrahim yang nakal di butik, Luna tetap bersabar kerana terpaksa membayar hutangnya. Melihatkan kerja keras Luna, Ibrahim boleh cair juga. Tetapi kenapa Luna dipecat oleh Ibrahim?

programme.title: D'Academy Asia 6 Ep2
programme.desc: D'Academy Asia dengan slogan "Suara Sejati Asia" adalah pertandingan menyanyi dangdut tingkat Asia. Negara berikutnya yang akan bergabung dalam DA Asia 6 adalah Trkiye! Bersiaplah menjadi bintang dangdut terbesar di Asia!

programme.title: Confidential Assignment
programme.desc: When a crime organization from N. Korea crosses borders and enters S. Korea, a S. Korean detective must cooperate with a N. Korean detective to investigate their whereabouts.

programme.title: Miracle: Letters To The President
programme.desc: A math prodigy who dreams of building a small railway station in his village works hard to win the presidential math competition and present his petition to the President in person.

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: The Spies
programme.desc: Kim, a North Korean spy who had lived in South Korea for 22 years is suddenly contacted by his superior. His team plans to complete an earlier mission and steal the target's large stockpile of cash.

programme.title: Search Out
programme.desc: When a social media influencer finds traces of cyberbullying that led to his neighbor's suicide, he teams up with his friend to untangle the mystery behind the deadly game.

programme.desc: Go-ni's nephew, Ham Dae-gil, enters the gambling underworld only to be used as a scapegoat in a deal gone wrong. Now he's planning his revenge by entering one big fatal game.

programme.title: Be With You

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.title: Papa

programme.desc: While driving home for his daughter's birthday, a man gets trapped in a collapsed tunnel and struggles to survive with just two bottles of water, a birthday cake and a cell phone.

programme.title: My Lovely Angel
programme.desc: A man bears the responsibility to take care of a deaf-blind girl unexpectedly, which turns out to be life-changing to both of them.

programme.title: Go Go With Mr. Paik Ep5

programme.title: Earth Arcade Ep3

programme.desc: When a single career woman reunites with her best friend's younger brother after he returns from three years of working abroad, their efforts to reconnect grow into romance.

programme.desc: The China Showbiz gathers together a wide range of wonderful TV artistic works and directs viewers into a fabulous world of arts through works appreciation and review.

programme.title: CCTV 4 Special Program Ep10
programme.desc: CCTV 4 Special Program

programme.title: Across the Strait Ep224
programme.desc: The Across the Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflects the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and details the Chinese Governments policy of one country, two systems in a bid to enhance the Taiwan fellowmens understanding of the Mainland China.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: Focus Today

programme.title: International Depth Ep2
programme.desc: International News Weekly Review

programme.title: Network News
programme.desc: Network News is a 30min news, news about china and the world.

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep9596
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46754676

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2070
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3652
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2071

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa(T) Ep166
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1048
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep108
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Taichung Player(M) Ep4445
programme.desc: Chin-Lan Chang & Top Social Media Infulencer travel & explore Taichong!

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep458
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: The Wonder Woman(M) Ep2627
programme.desc: Be a "shark", if you're a woman, to survive in your working and personal relationship? DU,AI-SHA, also known as Shark, is aggressive and ruthless YI,FEI-YANG nickname is "Orca". Orcas kills sharks. That implies the relationship between them. They are friends and foes at the same time. They show no mercy and never surrender. Love comes and goes but friendship lasts forever. AI-SHA doesn't want to lose her best friend YI,FEI-YANG. She doesn't need love, but she needs him.

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Think Big Big
programme.desc: Moon is a plus-sized girl working happily as a mascot at a theme park. That is until one day she accidentally joins a weight loss competition, with her remarkable transformation turning her into the "Nations Goddess". Netizens have their eyes glued on her, turning her life upside down, and Moon has to find a way to be happy again.

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chefs delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: The Grandmaster of Kungfu
programme.desc: The Eight-Nation Alliance dare not invade Tianjin as it is the homeland of martial arts. To conquer the city, Japan sends its top martial arts master to open a new academy challenging all Chinese masters. Huo Yuan Jia rises to fight, leading the other masters to resist the Japanese and defend the country.

programme.title: Far Far Away
programme.desc: A 28-year-old IT geek has only been in love once. Surprisingly, he ends up getting romantically involved with five different women this year and the one thing they have in common is that they all live in far flung areas of Hong Kong. After taking five intensive relationship courses within these 365 days, will he find the-one?

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Ekin Cheng and Chrissie Chau reunite in this romantic-comedy about three heartbroken men who each purchase an iGirl, the latest smart-robot, as their new girlfriends.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: From Beijing With Love
programme.desc: Stephen Chow writes, directs & stars in this hilarious James Bond spoof that sees the Chinese government assign their worst secret agent (Chow) to recover a stolen dinosaur skull.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killers mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: Keep Rolling
programme.desc: Directorial debut of Man Lim Chung, who spent 3 years filming this documentary about the life and filmmaking philosophy of Ann Hui, one of Hong Kongs greatest filmmakers. It traces Huis life story and her 40-year careers ups and downs using film footages, candid conversations with Hui, and interviews with her collaborators, family and friends.

programme.title: Marrying Mr Perfect
programme.desc: Winnie is dumped by her boyfriend in her late twenties and unknowingly meets Koo, a ruthless tycoon in business and a playboy. Koo temporarily switches identities with his driver for security reason and falls for Winnie as she is the first girl to love him for who he is. What will happen when Winnie know Koos real identity?

programme.title: A Guilty Conscience
programme.desc: Due to the negligence of sharp-tongued barrister Adrian, his innocent client is convicted of murder and sentenced to 17 years in jail. An opportunity to appeal the case and free his client arises a few years later, but in order to right his wrong, he must fight against one of the most powerful families in Hong Kong for justice to prevail.

programme.title: Beyond the Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: The Sparring Partner
programme.desc: Adapted from a sensational 2013 parricide in Hong Kong, a young man partners with his friend to murder and dismember his parents. Pleading not guilty, the defendants play the devil and idiot game, while the defense attorneys turn on each other. Meanwhile, heated debates emerge inside the jury room, where nine jurors grapple with the truth.

programme.title: Tears of No Regret
programme.desc: Monkey King is bewitched and harmed by an evil spirit, who is none other than goddess Lucky Star in its previous life, whom Monkey King knows 300 years ago. He decides to travel back in time to find out what happened

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Mr McDreamy
programme.desc: A second generation rich man squanders his parents money and calls himself Mr McDreamy. When his parents finally have enough and cut him off financially, he establishes a Mr McDreamy Training Academy using various unconventional means to transform his four recruits into Mr McDreamies with hilarious results.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: In 2004, 10 months after the murder of Yan, Ming is transferred to do menial police work. Meanwhile, a new star Wing has emerged in the police force. Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring that his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: The Way We Keep Dancing
programme.desc: This sequel of The Way We Dance features the plight of Hong Kongs grassroots performing artists as they fight against the governments plan to gentrify an industrial district where they settled in.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: The Rise of Hero
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung studies hard for an exam in Guangzhou to win a chance to study abroad. However, Eunuch Hai plans to abort the overseas project and this conflict evolves into a real fight. Wong finally defeats Hai on his own and ensure the smooth continuation of the Study Abroad Campaign.

programme.title: A House of Happiness
programme.desc: Uncle Shui suffers from Alzheimer's disease but still remembers his son and late wife. His caregiver Ha Gu leaves him as she cannot stand his bad temper. He then falls in love with a woman who looks like his late wife but has a hidden agenda. His neighbours try to seek help from Ha Gu and Shuis son to make Shui see the truth about the newcomer.

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of former mercenaries reunite to plan an epic heist: boosting a truckload of medicine held by a foreign intelligence agency to supply a refugee camp in need. When they find the truck is filled with stolen gold however, they realize they have been double-crossed by one of their own and putting the situation right will be an all-out war.

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: Magnificent Wanderers
programme.desc: Lin and his two friends are traveling patriots who vow to stand up against violence and fight for justice. They meet a rich young man Chu by chance one day and the four become best friends. When a foreign prince plots to possess Chus family fortune and goes after him, Lin and friends go all out to help Chu fight against the villain.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: The Thunderbolt Fist
programme.desc: A vicious Japanese judo expert wants to prove that Chinese are the sick people of Asia and sets out to sabotage and kill the best martial artists in dangerous tournaments. To save his son from this, the head of Ping Pai Boxing Institute sends him to the mountains to learn the powerful Thunderbolt Fist technique from master fighter, Red Butterfly.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: As more people are learning martial arts from Shaolin, the Qing court orders for it to be banned and plans to destroy the temple. The Shaolin disciples decide to take their protest to the streets, using Shaolin skills to curb their hatred, but when the Qing troops start attacking Shaolin Temple, the disciples vow to protect it at all costs.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world. However, she is caught between both men whom she admires when facing a deadly duel.

programme.title: The Snake Prince
programme.desc: The Snake Prince lives on the Snake Mountain of Kwangsi with other snakes and they have lived peacefully with humans for a thousand years. All things change however, when the Snake Prince falls in love with one of the three beauties performing a sensual rain dance in the nearby village one day, and decides to marry her at all costs...

programme.title: The Web Of Death
programme.desc: To rule the martial arts world, the Head of the Snake Sect seeks to possess a deadly plant called Five Poison Web, spreading rumours on its whereabouts. Brothers Xiong and Kit are sent to investigate. Xiong falls in love with Su who has a clue of where the plant is, but she accidentally hurts Kit when seeking the plant, devastating Xiong.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Three buddies find a rare artifact known as the Double-Faced God but are poisoned by Lady Wu who steals the treasure from them. Before they die, they get their wives to promise to train their children to take back what is rightfully theirs. These kids grow up to exact a vengeance that turns out to be more hilarious than horrific in this comedy.

programme.title: Enchanting Shadow
programme.desc: A young scholar Ning spends the night in a creepy temple that is said to be haunted. He does not believe in the rumours, but soon meets a beautiful female ghost Nie. Nie is forced to stay in the temple to seduce young men for a powerful demon to feast on. Knowing Nie to be a kind ghost, Ning decides to help her escape from the demons clutches.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master named Shadow Whip, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to Shadow Whip?

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: In this horror anthology an old man dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a mortician's ghost goes on the rampage.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: One of the first kung fu comedies, this is a story about a con artist who uses kung fu to swindle villagers for money by pretending to be possessed by spirits. When they are threatened by bandits, he must use the same skills for good.

programme.title: The Blue And The Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: Gambler'S Delight
programme.desc: The Killer star Danny Lee plays the lead role of a guy who needs to become a hero. He lies, steals and cheats his way into operating a plush casino, but when he incurs the wrath of a female Japanese gang leader, all bets are off!

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: David Chiang plays the all-new one-armed hero - a man who chops off his right arm rather than live with dishonor. When the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend is murdered by the evil gang, it is time to battle.

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: Men From The Monastery
programme.desc: At the end of the Ming Dynasty, Wu San Gui betrays his people to the Qing officials and recruits fighters from all backgrounds. Members from Wudan and Ermei are the first to yield and collude with local bullies. When they start attacking the Shaolin Monastery, its most famous disciples have to band together and fight against the enemies.

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: Clan Feuds
programme.desc: Like legendary director Chu Yuan did so often and so successfully, Chang Peng Yi adapted this film from a story by Ku Lung. Following the footsteps of the equally legendary Chang Cheh, Chang also casted the majestic Ti Lung, along with "Venoms Lo Meng and Sun Chien, for a spectacular showcase of mystical Martial Arts Worlds intrigue and consummate Kung Fu.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: Swordswomen Three
programme.desc: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon could be called "Swordswomen Two." Three decades earlier, Shen Yi, Essie Lin Chia, and Pan Ying-tzu took on Shaw's first international superstar, Lo Lieh for the Han Family Sword - making this a four-star treat for action fans.

programme.title: The Blue And The Black
programme.desc: Set during the Japanese occupation in World War II, a young orphan Tang Qi falls in a love with a young man Chang. However, their love is filled with challenges, from family pressure to the turmoil of war. When Tang Qi was raped, she is expelled from home to become a nightclub singer and embarks on a journey of no return

programme.title: Crazy Nuts Of Kung Fu
programme.desc: A roadside bandit and a traveling gambler team up to make money from gambling. In a successful attempt to steal a huge amount of money from a warlords home, they encounter revolutionists who seek their help to fund the reform campaign. Will the two help the revolutionists cause with the stolen money?

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A master jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: Return Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: An imperial minister Cheng betroths his pretty younger daughter, Ye, to his friend's son, Mu. His wife however, refuses to let Ye marry before her elder daughter Yan, who is ugly and undesirable. Yan is asked to pretend as Ye to meet Mu but scares him away. A rich guy who likes Ye meanwhile pretends as Mu to attend the wedding...

programme.title: Ghosts Galore
programme.desc: Young Taoist priest Lu and his friend are nearly killed by a female ghost during an exorcism. Luckily, Master Lian saves their lives, so they beseech him to teach them his skills. When his friend is killed by ruthless ninjas, Lu decides to learn the ultimate witchcraft and teams up with his master to defeat them.

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her fathers towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: Heroes Of The East
programme.desc: A Chinese man marries a Japanese woman through an arranged marriage and manages to insult all of her Japanese martial arts family by issuing a challenge to her that is misinterpreted by the others. He must then prove how good Chinese Kung Fu really is through a series of duels with the seven Japanese martial artists who come to meet the challenge!

programme.title: Between Tears And Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The Generals henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: Little Hero
programme.desc: An orphan, Little Bastard is taken on and trained as a fighter by a hermit. When Little Bastard grows up, he feels he is old enough to go out and look for his parents. Luckily for him, he befriends a beggar, Hsiao Yi, who being street-wise, manages to help him find his family, but somehow gets into trouble with the gang.

programme.title: Podhuvaga En Manasu Thangam
programme.desc: Tamil Thriller Romantic Movie, Starring, Udhayanidhi Stalin, Nivetha Pethuraj, Parthiepan, Soori, Mayilsamy,Rajendran & Others

programme.desc: An Andaman tribal who escapes from men trying to capture his people, ends up in the care of a spoilt, rich girl, who starts to fall in love with him. The Film features Jayam Ravi & Sayeesha in the lead roles

programme.title: Judge Judy S23 Ep46
programme.desc: A stylist discovers that the electricity turned off and claims that all of her property was stolen. A couple sue a solar power salesman after he allegedly trimmed their trees to install solar panels.

programme.title: Judge Judy S23 Ep47
programme.desc: After the death of her son, a woman claims his friend charged thousands on her credit card without her permission.

programme.title: Judge Judy S23 Ep48
programme.desc: A young woman is accused of breaking out windows of an ex-friend's home after she sees a video of her boyfriend with another girl. After a miscarriage, a woman claims she needed her family for support.

programme.desc: Caprice - Dwight takes note of a possible new business opportunity. Later, a routine errand has an explosive, unexpected outcome. Stacy opens up to Dwight about what led her to Tulsa.

programme.title: Tad, The Lost Explorer And The Secret Of King Midas
programme.desc: Tad attend archaeologist Sara Lavroff's presentation of her latest discovery - the papyrus that shows the existence of the Necklace of Midas, the mythical King who turned everything he touched into gold.

programme.title: A Month By The Lake
programme.desc: An attractive older guest at the Lake Como Resort has her eye on a handsome, well-to-do bachelor, and will go to outrageous lengths to reel in her wealthy catch.

programme.title: Same Kind of Different as Me
programme.desc: An ex-con drifter develops an unlikely friendship with a wealthy Dallas art dealer.

programme.title: This is Stand-Up
programme.desc: This Is Stand-Up documentary pulls back the curtain on this cherished, but perhaps little understood art-form.

programme.title: Revolutionary Road
programme.desc: A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children.

programme.title: The Bite S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Fifth Wave - Rachel enlists Lily's help with an important task in order to further her mother's medical research into a cure; Zach learns surprising information from his CDC colleague and former lover.

programme.title: xXx: Return of Xander Cage
programme.desc: Xander Cage is left for dead after an incident, though he secretly returns to action for a new, tough assignment with his handler Augustus Gibbons.

programme.title: A River Within
programme.desc: Five women with their own personal struggles travel to the Orange River for their Adventure Therapy. When things go awry in their river rafting adventure, their survival instincts kick in forcing them to dig deep.

programme.title: Parents vs Influencers
programme.desc: Philosophy professor Paolo is a single father who finds himself losing his teenage daughter to her social media addiction. His efforts to dissuade her from using social media ironically results in Paolo becoming a social media influencer himself.

programme.title: Light Years
programme.desc: Three siblings that have grown apart, find themselves forcibly reunited as they need to sell off their childhood home. They embark on a journey to their hometown in their fathers old car, and the road home forces them to confront their buried conflicts.

programme.title: Mokhtar
programme.desc: After waking up in the forest alone, Mokhtar spots another soldier and attempts to attack him. After a brief struggle, both Mokhtar and his foe realize they need each other to survive in the hostile environment, and they slowly gain the others trust.

programme.title: Oddball
programme.desc: An eccentric chicken farmer, with the help of his granddaughter, trains his mischievous dog Oddball to protect a penguin sanctuary from fox attacks in an attempt to reunite his family and save their seaside town.

programme.title: Commitment Hasan
programme.desc: Farmer Hasan is at a crossroads between challenges and new opportunities. A high-voltage mast can end up in the middle of his fertile and cultivated land. But can this invasion of modernity be resolved now that the neighbouring plot is for sale?

programme.title: The Grump
programme.desc: After a bad fall, a grumpy old farmer is forced to move to the city to live with his meek son and domineering daughter-in-law. He ends up squabbling with her and the house becomes a chaotic hellhole. Yet, with time, the family becomes closer than ever.

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump
programme.desc: When Grump's wife dies, he sees no reason to live on. But just as his coffin is finished, Grump gets a new spark and a major secret! His teenage granddaughter is in trouble and needs help and wisdom from her grandfather, and the warmth of his fireplace.

programme.title: Murders In Rochefort
programme.desc: Police Chief Emma is tasked with the case of a murdered corpse in the forest. However, her partner is a previous one-night-stand. Struggling to keep their emotions in check, the duo fumbles their way through the investigation as more bodies show up.

programme.title: Thou Shalt Not Hate
programme.desc: Simone is an established surgeon and son of a holocaust survivor. After refusing to save a victim of a traffic accident with a swastika tattoo, he must grapple with the guilt he feels from his decision.

programme.title: The Grump
programme.desc: After a bad fall, a grumpy old farmer is forced to move to the city to live with his meek son and domineering daughter-in-law. He ends up squabbling with her and the house becomes a chaotic hellhole. Yet, with time, the family becomes closer than ever.

programme.title: Standing Up For Sunny
programme.desc: When Travis, a self-isolated recluse with low-grade cerebral palsy and anger management issues falls for Sunny, an unassuming comedian, he must take the stage to show his true self and win her love.

programme.title: Happier Times, Grump

programme.title: Galloping Mind
programme.desc: A pair of twins are separated at birth and meet again twelve years later. Attracted by a nebulous bond, they begin an exciting journey of their roots and become destined for a brutal confrontation with their past.

programme.title: Zero Bridge
programme.desc: Dilawar, a rebellious teenager who lives in Kashmir, wants to escape to Delhi for a better life. One fateful day, he pickpockets from Bani, a young lady who has just left America. An unlikely friendship blossoms and their lives are to be changed forever.

programme.title: The Inland Road
programme.desc: After surviving a car crash when running away from home, Tia finds herself having nowhere to go. Seeking out the family of the crash victim, she moves in with them and threatens to upend the familys delicate balance.

programme.title: A Murder Of Crows Hush Little Baby
programme.desc: After a lantern parade, two-year-old Paulina is found missing from her room. The chilling kidnapping hurls Investigator Martin Bruhl back into a sleepless nightmare he experienced two years ago.

programme.title: Blackbird
programme.desc: Sean, a rebellious teenager, is falsely accused of planning a school massacre. He must survive a harrowing conflict with a prison gang leader while he attempts to prove his innocence to the community and those close to him.

programme.title: The Inland Road
programme.desc: After surviving a car crash when running away from home, Tia finds herself having nowhere to go. Seeking out the family of the crash victim, she moves in with them and threatens to upend the familys delicate balance.

programme.title: Nightfall In India
programme.desc: In the 60s, Ricardo would facilitate overland travel from Europe to India for hippies. Now, hes in the last stages of a degenerative disease. For his epic final journey, he sets off on the same route with his housekeeper and a hopeful spirit.

programme.title: A Murder Of Crows Hush Little Baby
programme.desc: After a lantern parade, two-year-old Paulina is found missing from her room. The chilling kidnapping hurls Investigator Martin Bruhl back into a sleepless nightmare he experienced two years ago.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Fourth Woman
programme.desc: The body of a woman is found in a hops field suspended like in a spider web, and a swimmer is later run over by a motorboat on the lake. Two police officers are sent to investigate the case and they uncover how the two deaths might be related.

programme.title: Blackbird
programme.desc: Sean, a rebellious teenager, is falsely accused of planning a school massacre. He must survive a harrowing conflict with a prison gang leader while he attempts to prove his innocence to the community and those close to him.

programme.title: Jirga
programme.desc: In this bracingly raw film about vindication and grace, an Australian ex-soldier goes to Afghanistan to seek absolution from the family of a civilian he had killed in the war. And it will be the 10 year old son of the deceased who will decide his fate.

programme.title: Lessons of a Dream
programme.desc: Koch, a young Englishman teacher, tries to change a strict German boys schools archaic ways and prejudiced views of the English with unconventional methods. A battle ensues between his detractors who want him out and his students who adore him.

programme.title: Heart Of A Lion
programme.desc: Teppo, the leader of a gang of neo-nazis, falls in love with Sari. To his shock, Saris son is black, and Teppo finds his prejudices and loyalties pitted against his desire for love and family.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S17 3
programme.desc: Caution -- these people are operating motor vehicles under the influence of DUMB. TruTV is counting down the 20 most hysterical Motorheads on the road, in the sky, and on the water. programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 13
programme.desc: Our buyers are in for the fight of their lives as they lock horns at the nation's biggest shipping container auction. This day's competition is not for the faint of heart. With skyrocketing bids and unprecedented merchandise, it's a gambler's dream come true. But at the end of the day, one buyer will be crowned with a six-figure payday while another will be sent home broken in two.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 1
programme.desc: Newbies Scott and Chrissy push their way onto Brandon and Lori's turf forcing the couple to burn cash like never before. Then, a set of wrapped pallets heats up the competition, forcing everyone to fight to the finish for what could be nothing morethan hidden garbage. And later, the bidding explodes over a large mystery item. And when the dust settles, two lucky storage warriors unveil the most explosive treasure to date.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 2
programme.desc: Arch-enemies drop their guard to team up against a new threat. Then, it's back to the future when Desert Dan risks all on a tire and a hunch. And later, blades are drawn, fragile alliances crumble, and the buyers let nothing stand in the way of winning big.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S3 3
programme.desc: Jesse knows you don't strike it rich if you play it safe, so he gambles big on a risky bin. Then, Lori defies her husband Brandon and buys a questionable unit. Will her bold move lead to a dynasty or divorce? And later, lightning erupts when the buyers battle it out for a puzzle of parts they hope will add up to one smooth ride.

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: What do you get when you cross toxic waste with a bunch of exotic spiders?.. Eaten!.. The residents of a rural mining town discover that an unfortunate chemical spill has caused hundreds of little spiders to mutate overnight to the size of SUVs. And their hungry! When the alarm is sounded, it's then up to mining engineer Chris McCormack and Sheriff Sam Parker to mobilize an eclectic group of townspeople, including the Sheriff's young son, Mike, her daughter, Ashley and paranoid radio announcer Harlan Griffith and Deputy Pete Willis into battle against the bloodthirsty eight-legged beasts.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: Two days before his wedding, Doug drives to Las Vegas with his best buddies Phil and Stu and his future brother-in-law Alan, for a blow-out bachelor party they vow they'll never forget. But when the three groomsmen wake up the next morning with pounding headaches, they can't remember a thing. Their luxury hotel suite is beyond trashed and the groom is nowhere to be found. With no clue about what happened and little time to spare, the trio must attempt to retrace their bad decisions from the night before in order to figure out where things went wrong in the hopes of finding Doug and getting him back to L.A. in time for his wedding. But the more they begin to uncover, the more they realize just how much trouble they're really in.

programme.desc: The Truckee Strip - A silver baron schemes to promote a fight between Ben and his neighbor just to get his hands on timber. Joe Cartwright falls in love with Amy Bishop and the two lovers try to stop the family feud between the Cartwrights and the Bishops.

programme.title: Bonanza S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Hanging Posse - Adam and Joe attempt to stop a posse bent on catching the murderers of Vannie Johnson from changing into a lynch mob.

programme.title: Small Wonder S4 Ep08
programme.desc: Togetherness - The Lawsons enter a game show to get back at the Brindles for trying to kick them off the eligibility list.

programme.title: Small Wonder S4 Ep09
programme.desc: My Favorite Martian - While Jamie tests out Ted's new laser projection system in Vicki's eyes, unwary Brandon glimpses her projection of a movie's flying saucer and calls the Air Force to investigate.

programme.title: Small Wonder S4 Ep10
programme.desc: Mommie Dearest - Joan's doctor father drops by to visit and Ida Mae smells a plump husband. Meanwhile, Vicki vies for school cheerleader.

programme.title: Small Wonder S4 Ep11
programme.desc: No Laughing Matter - A digestion feedback problem with Vicki's polynucleotide processor generates nitrous oxide gas that brings laughs to anyone near her, but not to Vicki herself.

programme.title: Small Wonder S4 Ep13
programme.desc: The Jailbirds - Jamie and Vicki are arrested for spray-painting a wall and its owner's $60 shirt.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot S2 Ep02
programme.desc: The Lost Mine - While Poirot is checking his account, the chairman of his bank is waiting for a Chinese man. This man is expected to sell the bank a map showing the location of a lost silver mine.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot S2 Ep03
programme.desc: The Cornish Mystery - When a woman believes her life is in danger, Poirot and Hastings find her neighbours close ranks against interfering outsiders.

programme.title: Charmed S5 Ep01
programme.desc: A Witch's Tail Part I - Piper, Phoebe and Paige come to the aid of Mylie, a Mermaid-turned-human, when she shows up looking for their help after a pact she made with an evil Sea Hag begins to go drastically wrong.

programme.title: Cheers S3 Ep17
programme.desc: The Mail Goes To Jail - Suffering from a bad cold, Cliff takes time off his mail route to warm up inside Cheers, where Norm generously offers to finish his deliveries on his way home.

programme.title: Cheers S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Bar Bet - An old bet forces Sam to choose between getting married or losing Cheers.

programme.title: Cheers S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Behind Every Great Man - Sam's reputation as a ladies' man is on the line when Paula Nelson, an astute reporter from Boston Scene magazine, visits Cheers to do a story on the singles scene and is immediately turned off by Sam.

programme.title: Cheers S3 Ep20
programme.desc: If I Ever Would Leave You - When Carla's sleazy ex-husband gets thrown out by his new wife, he comes groveling back to Carla, vowing to prove his love for her by being her slave. Soon everyone, except Carla, believes him.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S1 Ep09
programme.desc: A Spool There Was - The IMF accepts the assignment of recovering a reel of recording wire detailing a chemical warfare project being developed against the free world in "A Spool There Was"

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S1 Ep10
programme.desc: The Carriers - The IMF infiltrates a secret training site in a scheme to prevent a hostile regime from killing millions of Americans through germ warfare in "The Carriers"

programme.title: Mission: Impossible S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Zubrovnik's Ghost - Dan Briggs dispatches Rollin Hand, Barney and Ariana, a spiritualist, to Austria to persuade an American scientist, Dr. Martha Zubrovnik, not to give the results of her research to the Russians in "Zubrovnik's Ghost"

programme.title: Columbo S5 Ep03
programme.desc: Identity Crisis - A cunning advertising consultant (Patrick McGoohan) leading a double life as a spy tries to cover up the details of a homicide.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S7 Ep09
programme.desc: Rockabye - When Lauren is found badly beaten and taken to a New York hospital, it is discovered she's a runaway from Virginia whose father Philip Westley has been in the city searching for her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S7 Ep10
programme.desc: Storm - Detectives Benson and Stabler aggressively pursue a child molester who kidnapped three young sisters from New Orleansafter their parents were killed in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S7 Ep11
programme.desc: Alien - When a bruised, bloodied and severely injured 12-year-old boy is dumped outside a hospital, Detectives Benson and Stabler are led to a teenager seen beating the boy a week earlier at St. Victor's school.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep1
programme.desc: You Cant Always Trust What You See - Will Halstead returns to Med to help Goodwin with a secret investigation. Archer and Charles deal with twins who insist on being identical inside and out.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep2
programme.desc: To Lean In, Or To Let Go - Vanessa and Archer disagree on how to handle the victim of a motorcycle accident. Dylan and Charles deal with a UNICEF negotiator with repressed trauma.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep3
programme.desc: Be The Change You Want To See - Dylan and Will deal with a dishonest patient whose lupus is in remission. A wealthy donor makes inappropriate advances toward Stevie.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep4
programme.desc: Status Quo, AKA The Mess We're In - Charles helps Dylan with a longtime patient who was recently diagnosed with schizophrenia. Stevie, Maggie and Vanessa investigate the legitimacy of a patients cancer diagnosis.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep5
programme.desc: Change Is A Tough Pill To Swallow - Dylan and Charles treat patients suffering from Glass Child Syndrome and misdiagnosed ADHD.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep6
programme.desc: When You're A Hammer Everything's A Nail - Stevies personal and professional worlds collide when her mother becomes her patient.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep7
programme.desc: A Square Peg In A Round Hole - Crockett helps Dr. Blake replace a patients liver. Vanessa tries to prove herself. Will continues to pursue the truth about Cooper.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep8
programme.desc: Just As A Snake Sheds Its Skin - Dylan's loyalty to Med and the police department is challenged when an old family friend and veteran cop exhibits concerning behavior.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep9
programme.desc: Secret Santa Has A Gift For You - The outcome of Wills investigation weighs heavily on his mind as he works with Dylan to save a 4-month-old patient.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep10
programme.desc: No Good Deed Goes Unpunished... In Chicago - In the aftermath of the Vas-COM scandal, Goodwin clashes with the hospitals new compliance officer.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep11
programme.desc: The Things We Left Behind - Crockett and Blake clash with Randall when a famous alcoholic football player needs a liver transplant. Dylan is reluctantly reunited with old friends when their son breaks his arm.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep12
programme.desc: What You Don't Know Can't Hurt You - Will and Stevie get stuck in the middle of a marital face-off. Dr. Blakes entire surgical team mysteriously collapses during a liver transplant.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep13
programme.desc: Reality Leaves A Lot To The Imagination - Dylan and Archer diagnose a pregnant woman with a serious infection.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep14
programme.desc: All The Things That Could Have Been - Goodwin assigns Meds new compliance officer to a patient with a long-hauler Covid condition.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep15
programme.desc: Things Meant To Be Bent Not Broken - Dylans cop instincts come to life when he suspects his patient may be a drug dealer.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep16
programme.desc: May Your Choices Reflect Hope, Not Fear - Will helps a patient with long-haul Covid symptoms. Vanessa reflects on her dating life when she learns that a patients daughter is having an arranged marriage.

programme.title: Chicago Med S7 Ep17
